app.title: WORLD OF FEELINGS
ui.survive: Keep the balance for {0} days. Keep feelings between 1 and 99.
ui.final_stats: Final balance — Joy {0}, Sadness {1}, Anger {2}, Fear {3}, Calm {4}.
ending.JOY_LOW.title: FADED LIGHT
ending.JOY_LOW.body:
Everything sinks into a gray gloom. Nothing good stays for long, like birds that keep flying, unable to land.

Balance needed joy - not constant celebration, just warmth to prove this world is still worth returning to.
ending.JOY_HIGH.title: BLINDING SUN
ending.JOY_HIGH.body:
Joy grew louder than reality. The world became like a stage light: bright, alluring, but shallow.

There is no room here to acknowledge pain, yet it does not disappear, only gathers inside the soul’s walls until they break.
ending.SADNESS_LOW.title: THE EMPTINESS OF CONSTANCY
ending.SADNESS_LOW.body:
Without sadness, nothing can gain meaning. Loss has no name, and love loses its weight.

The world remains clean, but stops being true.
ending.SADNESS_HIGH.title: DEEP WATERS
ending.SADNESS_HIGH.body:
Sadness floods the land, seeping in from everywhere. The air is heavy with meanings that never start moving.

The world is gentle, but it is drowning. It needs relief.
ending.ANGER_LOW.title: WEAK SPIRIT
ending.ANGER_LOW.body:
Anger disappears, and with it do boundaries. The world has forgotten how to say no.

When nothing resists, anything can be taken.
ending.ANGER_HIGH.title: SCARLET SKY
ending.ANGER_HIGH.body:
Anger takes over everything. It scorches the earth, making it howl with pain, turning everything into a contest for survival.

Nothing can be mended, because the blood-red sky tunes everyone for war.
ending.FEAR_LOW.title: OPEN DOOR
ending.FEAR_LOW.body:
Fear is destroyed. All borders are erased.

The world does not become brave, only defenseless.
ending.FEAR_HIGH.title: CLOSED CITY
ending.FEAR_HIGH.body:
Fear grows, every corner feels like a trap. The safest choice is to not choose at all.

The world survives, but does not live, only exists.
ending.CALM_LOW.title: SHARDS OF THE SURFACE
ending.CALM_LOW.body:
Calm drains from the world, and it loses its footing. Every feeling demands attention, shouting in one voice.

There is no time to listen to what they are trying to say.
ending.CALM_HIGH.title: GLASS MUSEUM
ending.CALM_HIGH.body:
Calm hardens, demanding perfection. The world is like a museum: clean, silent, untouchable.

Balance needs calm as support, not as a prison.
ending.HARMONY.title: HARMONY
ending.HARMONY.body:
Days pass. The world remains imperfect in its fragile stability.

Feelings keep arriving - not as enemies, but like weather: sometimes sharp, often beautiful, always changing.
ending.RESONANCE.title: RESONANCE
ending.RESONANCE.body:
A deep rhythm takes shape. Instead of forcing balance, the world learns to mend itself.

Joy shares space with sadness, fear warns, and anger and calm protect without consuming.

The world is like a tuned instrument that has learned to listen.
card.prologue_threshold.prompt:
A door beckons you. It leads to a world ruled by feelings, not faces.

The air presses softly, like a held breath. Something begs for direction, but not control.
card.prologue_threshold.left: Open slowly and listen to the surroundings first.
card.prologue_threshold.right: Step in confidently and set the mood.
card.prologue_maproom.prompt:
The whole floor is an unfolded map that is slowly changing its color. Paths appear only if you look out of the corner of your eye.

If they stabilize, you’ll be able to travel. But uncertainty leads to a harsher world.
card.prologue_maproom.left: Carefully run a finger across the map, pointing out routes. Let them shift without tearing the paper.
card.prologue_maproom.right: Press the map down and draw one single path.
card.act1_color_wells.prompt:
Fissures overflowing with color spring from the ground. Their brightness is life’s fuel.

Too much color hurries everything along. Its absence imposes distance.
card.act1_color_wells.left: Let color grow freely, accept its force.
card.act1_color_wells.right: Sort the color, keeping it calm.
card.act1_silent_market.prompt:
A market where nothing is sold, only exchanged: a place to relieve.

Silence is law here. Break it and the place will overflow with energy, but a hunger for quiet will reign.
card.act1_silent_market.left: Respect the silence, exchange feelings slowly.
card.act1_silent_market.right: Let noise in, let feelings spill into the earth.
card.act1_echo_corridor.prompt:
A corridor that repeats what was never said aloud. It listens to words and returns them.

Echo creates depth. Destroying it creates peaceful silence. Everything has its price.
card.act1_echo_corridor.left: Leave the echo, making room for unfinished truths.
card.act1_echo_corridor.right: Destroy the echo, it is mercy for this forgotten place.
card.act1_heatline.prompt:
A red river churns right beneath the bridge. This is pure anger: a fiery heat without a history.

The waters can be released carefully, or saved for later, letting them build strength.
card.act1_heatline.left: Release it carefully in small portions, not allowing harm.
card.act1_heatline.right: Save it, strength will be needed when a storm of feelings comes.
card.act1_mist_of_maybe.prompt:
A haze gathers low around your feet: uncertainty that never made a decision.

In the fog, everything can be anything. That possibility can heal or paralyze.
card.act1_mist_of_maybe.right: Thin the haze, letting choices happen.
card.act1_soft_rain.prompt:
Rain falls. Each drop carries the weight of acceptance.

A downpour can cleanse, but it can also soak the world so deeply that moving becomes too heavy.
card.act1_soft_rain.left: Let the rain continue, let release happen on its own.
card.act1_soft_rain.right: Keep the rain out, let everything stay dry and fast.
card.act1_mirror_layer.prompt:
A thin mirrored surface covers the atmospheric layer like skin. It reflects feelings.

Sharpness hurts. Smoothness suffocates. The mirror asks which risk is safer right now.
card.act1_mirror_layer.right: Smooth the layer, accept a muted truth.
card.act_break_first_bell.prompt: You hear the ringing of a bell with no source. The sound is everywhere and from nowhere, and yet it does not exist.
card.act_break_first_bell.left: Give the ringing time to settle.
card.act_break_first_bell.right: Answer the bell, actively following the changes.
card.act2_overflow_gate.prompt:
A gate appears at the edge. Behind it is a tide of feelings: they arrive too quickly to grasp.

If you open it, everything will spill into your world. But if you keep it shut, the pressure will keep building.
card.act2_overflow_gate.left: Open it, let the feelings be seen.
card.act2_overflow_gate.right: Keep accumulating, the world is not ready yet.
card.act2_archive_unfelt.prompt:
In a quiet archive lies everything postponed: joys never celebrated, sadness never allowed out, rage never accepted.

If you keep it, you preserve the truth. Burning it will make space for new records. Give this world a shape.
card.act2_archive_unfelt.left: Leave the archive, to sort through these feelings later.
card.act2_archive_unfelt.right: Burn the archive, don’t let the past prevent the future.
card.act2_glass_lake.prompt: The lake is so calm it reflects intentions instead of light. If you step closer, the water’s surface thickens, as if studying you.
card.act2_glass_lake.right: Let it shimmer, actively inviting risk.
card.act2_red_thread.prompt:
A red thread runs through the seam of the entire world. It binds every boundary together.

If you pull it, everything once suppressed will come undone. Tying the thread limits what could become destructive.
card.act2_night_message.prompt:
At night, a message arrives from nowhere. No words, only the imagined sense that it is here.

Answering will create a bond with the world. Ignoring it, you remain safe. The world will notice either way.
card.act2_noise_tax.prompt:
Noise spreads, drawing attention. But every loud sound demands payment in calm.

If you amplify it, you’ll lose resilience. If you feed it, you risk drowning life in unrest.
card.act2_noise_tax.left: Reduce the noise, giving time for self-awareness.
card.act2_noise_tax.right: Feed the noise, let the energy carry the day forward.
card.act2_color_debt.prompt:
Filtered-out color returns as debt. The world remembers what was removed and wants compensation.

Restoring color may weigh things down. But if you keep filtering, the world may starve for joy.
card.act2_color_debt.left: Restore color, accept the intense fuel.
card.act2_color_debt.right: Keep sorting, protecting stability at the cost of color.
card.act2_echo_return.prompt:
The old echo returns, carrying new meanings. It does not repeat - it evolves.

Let it sing out, and the world will gain depth. Muffle it, and the world will accept silence.
card.act_break_second_bell.prompt:
You hear the ringing again. This time it feels more like a question.

The world no longer asks for balance. It wants to be understood.
card.act_break_second_bell.left: Stop and prepare a careful answer.
card.act_break_second_bell.right: Keep moving and shape your answer quickly.
card.act3_resonance_frame.prompt:
An empty space appears. Inside it, feelings line up into a specific pattern.

If resonance is prepared, it learns self-governance. If it is imposed, it becomes a fragile glow.
card.act3_resonance_frame.left: Tune the resonance slowly and evenly
card.act3_resonance_frame.right: Force resonance into being, reaching the glow right now.
card.act3_wall_of_weather.prompt:
A wall of weather blocks the streets: anger like lightning, sorrow like fog, fear like wind.

If you listen, it will pass. Fighting makes the weather fight back.
card.act3_wall_of_weather.left: Listen; let the world calm itself.
card.act3_wall_of_weather.right: Fight, leaving no room for the storm.
card.act3_gate_without_name.prompt:
Gates with no inscription. They lead to what the world refuses to describe.

Opening them is fraught with fear. Sealing them brings stagnation. Either way, a decision will be made.
card.act3_gate_without_name.left: Open them, facing the nameless feelings head-on.
card.act3_gate_without_name.right: Seal them, let the world remain as it is.
card.act3_balancing_ritual.prompt:
The ritual begins without instructions. It asks only for attention.

Balance makes the world stable. Brightening fills it with hope. Either can fail if pressured too hard.
card.ambient_drifting_lights.prompt:
Small lights drift through the air, like thoughts that never became sentences.

You can welcome them as gentle joy or drive them away.
card.ambient_floor_of_letters.prompt:
The floor is tiled with letters that do not form words until stepped on.

Keeping the letters preserves meaning. Cropping them away makes the world simpler, but poorer.
card.ambient_room_of_applause.prompt:
Applause fills a room no one has ever entered. It is as if recorded, like a reward without any deed done.

Keeping it may nourish joy.
card.ambient_room_of_applause.left: Leave it, accept the support, even if incomplete one.
card.ambient_room_of_goodbyes.prompt:
A place that listens to unspoken goodbyes.

If you hold on to them, you let stories close.
card.ambient_room_of_goodbyes.right: Make them hurry, the world needs to move forward.
card.finale_listen_or_shape.prompt:
The world becomes quiet enough to hear itself.

The question is simple: will the world be heard, or shaped into a single idea of what is right?
card.finale_listen_or_shape.left: Listen, let balance remain alive and flexible.
card.finale_listen_or_shape.right: Shape it, holding to one clear direction.
